definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: He refused to obey the court order and was sent to prison for contempt.
sentences.chinese: 他拒絕服從法院命令，因藐視法庭而被收監。

sentences.english: The cops put the device in his personal effects bag. Lincoln calls Agent Self for help.
sentences.chinese: 警察收監他時，把複製機放入了其隨身物品袋中。

sentences.english: He is in danger of being in contempt of court.
sentences.chinese: 他拒絕服從法院命令，因藐視法庭而被收監。
